title: Effect of education on LR productivity and growth

content.question: Increases in public investment in education and increased educational attainment by workers will have which of the following effects in the long run?

choices.label: Labor productivity will increase, and real GDP per capita will increase.
Labor productivity will increase, and real GDP per capita will decrease.
Labor productivity will increase, and real GDP per capita will not change.
Labor productivity will decrease, and real GDP per capita will increase.
Labor productivity will decrease, and real GDP per capita will decrease.

content.answer: Labor productivity will increase, and real GDP per capita will increase.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
